      • Teacher

        public Teacher(int i,
               Course course,
               java.lang.String[] question)
        Constructor for Teacher
        Parameters:
        i - int to be added to the String of the Teacher name
        course - For storing the Course that the Teacher is holding
        question - For storing the String[] with the Teachers question and answers to said question

    • Method Detail

      • talk

        public void talk(java.util.ArrayList<Course> completeCourses,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Course> incompleteCourses)
        Picks one of 4 different lines (at random) to print when invoked, or Teacher asks Avatar if they want to enroll the Course the Teacher is holding
        Parameters:
        completeCourses - The Students complete courses
        incompleteCourses - The Students incomplete courses

      • askQuestion

        public boolean askQuestion(boolean hasBook)
        The Teacher asks their question and supplies 3 answers (2 if Avatar has correct Book), only one is the right one
        Parameters:
        hasBook - boolean True if Avatar has the book for the Course, else False
        Returns:
        boolean isCorrect True if Avatar answers the question right, else False

        Returns:
